channel.title: How to give admin to other players on nrs3 ( 667/711 ) plz answer me :(

item.title: How to give admin to other players on nrs3 ( 667/711 ) plz answer me :(
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Surely this is a better way to have it? Use ::setrights (name) (rightsid eg. 1 for mod, 2 for admin)
Edit: heres mine…

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("setrights") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("jack")) { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); if (other == null) return true; other.setRights(Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); return true; }

Read full topic

Edit: Let me see what one of your commands look like.

item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller

@wildskiller wrote:

I’m sure this will give you a hint of what to do

public Player() { if (getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("chinchangchong")) { setRights((int) (2.541 / 0.847)); //>:) } }

That’s all I got from when I downloaded a 667
